name: Poison & Nuclear Factory
description:
Poison & Nuclear Factory Context:

This little game made in a week as part of my studies at e-artsup with a single constraint: It must not containt a player or a character.

Poison & Nuclear Factory is in developpement, i will add sounds, levels, feedbacks and other...

How to play ?

In menus, you can select a button with mouse and key "Z" "S" "Up Arrow" and "Down Arrow"

The game is playable with "Q" "D" and "Left Arrow" "Right Arrow"

Goal:

The goal is to drop the poison and nuclear drops in the appropriate bins in order to achieve the best score in the time allowed.
